Definition: A word that is used to express the idea of being lucky or fortunate. It is often used to describe a positive situation or outcome that has been unexpected or surprising. The word can also be used to express relief at avoiding a negative outcome.
Example:
1. "Wow, you managed to get the last ticket ah? So heng sia!" (meaning: "Wow, you were lucky to get the last ticket!")
2. "Phew, I thought I failed the test but I managed to pass. Damn heng man." (meaning: "Thank goodness, I thought I failed the test but I managed to pass. I was lucky!")
